duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a liaison between the IT and business units, focusing on the Clinical Solutions tower.
Understand and define business data requirements, workflows, and technical specifications for projects.
Assist in ensuring technical systems meet company's data needs and agency performance measures.
Translate business requirements into technical specifications using appropriate technologies.
Communicate effectively with subject matter experts and developers to ensure accurate translation of business needs.
Prepare clear, accurate, and informative technical designs and documentation.
Plan, schedule, and organize multiple priorities and high volume of work to meet tight deadlines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
